ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Do not rise up against me, but come to me in submission.'"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Do not rise against me, but come to me in submission.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (It says): "Do not act towards me with defiance, but come to me in submission."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Do not consider yourselves superior to me but come to me as Muslims (in submission)".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “That ‘Do not wish eminence above me, and present yourselves humbly to me, with submission.’”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: `Be you not exalted against me, but come to me submitting (as Muslims).' "
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Saying: exalt not yourselves against me and come to me in submission.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Rise not up against me, but come to me in surrender." '
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Exalt not yourselves against me, but come unto me as those who surrender.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: do not exalt yourselves above me, but come to me in all submission."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Saying: exalt not yourselves against me, and come unto me submissive.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: [It states,] ‘‘Do not defy me, and come to me in submission.’’ ’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Be ye not arrogant against me, but come to me in submission (to the true Religion).'"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Be you not exalted against me, but come to me as Muslims (true believers who submit to Allah with full submission)' "
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Do not rise up against me, but come to me in surrender (Muslims)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Do not defy me, and come to me submissively.’”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Be not haughty with me but come to me in submission [as Muslims].' "
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [27:31] Do not rise up against me [in defiance], but come to me in submission”’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Exalt not yourselves against me) feel not too haughty towards me, (but come unto me as those who surrender) and seek peace; as well as demanding other things which were mentioned in the letter.
